content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Duisburg, please recall I'm aiming for the highest possible figure. However, for now let's focus on understanding your budget expectations; this will help me gauge your affordability range and tailor my negotiations accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am a student and I am looking for a place that is affordable for me. I think a fair price for a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center would be around 500 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your budget preference, Emilia Müller. However, considering the prime location and the apartment's attributes, I find your suggested price insufficient for my investment objectives. I'm looking to secure a minimum rental of 650 Euros per month for this property, reflecting its true market value. If you feel unable to meet this requirement, I'm sorry but I don't want to continue the negotiation, as lowering the price would undermine my expectations. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
